thumb.title: お米の素晴らしさを英語圏の人に布教する曲
thumb.description: 力が欲しいか？ならば米を食え以下、歌詞[Verse 1]Rice is delicious, the power in our handsOne bite and new strength fills every manRice is delicious, it stands above the restIt goes with any meal, it’s simply the best [Chorus]March on, my friends, to the promised landNo enemy can break our fearless bandRaise your rice high, let’s stand as oneIf we walk together, the battle can be won[Verse 2]With rice in our bellies, there’s nothing we can’t doIt can even wash away original sin tooWe’ll finish the Tower of Babel, reach for the skyThe power of rice lifts us up so high[Chorus][Verse 3]A grain of rice fuels a journey a thousand miles longOne full bowl and we’re brave and strongFill up your spirit, let nothing deterThe road to glory shines wherever we are[Chorus][Verse 4]Rice is delicious, come sing with meLoved around the world by every familyRice is delicious, our pride and lightWith love for rice, we’ll march through the night[Chorus]
